title: Crypto Markets Today: Hawkish BOJ Comments Spur Sharp BTC Downturn
contentSnippet: A sharp sell-off following the CME bitcoin futures open, compounded by hawkish signals from the Bank of Japan, dragged the CoinDesk 20 down nearly 6% on Monday.

title: Hacked Down: Crypto Daybook Americas
contentSnippet: Your day-ahead look for Dec. 1, 2025

title: Germany, Switzerland Shut Down $1.4B Crypto Mixer in Cross-Border Operation: Europol
contentSnippet: The takedown of Cryptomixer disrupts a nine-year-old laundering hub relied upon by ransomware groups and darknet markets.

title: South Korea pushes for draft stablecoin bill by Dec. 10 deadline
contentSnippet: South Korean lawmakers set a Dec. 10 deadline for a stablecoin regulation draft, warning they’ll legislate independently if regulators miss the deadline.

title: Sony Bank Could Issue USD Stablecoin in U.S. Next Year: Nikkei
contentSnippet: The online banking arm of Sony Financial Group envisages the stablecoin being used to pay for games and anime.

title: CNBC Veteran Jay Yarow Joins CoinDesk to Expand Media and Events
contentSnippet: Yarow will oversee CoinDesk Insights as its parent company looks to expand digital asset coverage across the globe.

title: Israel’s Central Bank Signals Improved Stablecoin Oversight as Digital Shekel Plans Advance
contentSnippet: Bank of Israel Governor Amir Yaron said stablecoins can no longer be viewed as marginal, citing their trillion-dollar trading volumes and growing systemic risks.

title: Prediction markets bet on Coinbase-linked Hassett as top Fed pick
contentSnippet: Prediction markets Polymarket and Kalshi surge for the pro-crypto candidate as Trump’s likely Fed chair pick, just as internal Fed reforms spark pushback from veterans.

title: Crypto ETPs snap 4-week slide with $1B inflows as XRP posts its best week
contentSnippet: Crypto ETPs rebound with $1.07 billion inflows after four weeks of losses, while XRP hits record weekly gains amid US ETF launches.

title: Bitcoin, Ethereum, and XRP Crash Triggering $637M in Liquidations
contentSnippet: A weekend crypto crash triggered $524M in liquidations, with fears over Tether's stability and DAT selling pressure acting as key catalysts.

title: 日経グループQUICK、ビットコイン指数の算出開始
contentSnippet: QUICKは12月1日、円建てビットコイン指数の本格公表を開始した。試験運用から更新頻度を毎日に引き上げ、12月22日からはリアルタイム指数も提供する。暗号資産ETFなどでの利用を想定。

title: HashKey edges toward Hong Kong listing while China chills stablecoin plans
contentSnippet: HKEX published a post-hearing information pack for HashKey Holdings, pushing Hong Kong’s top crypto exchange closer to a high-profile IPO.

title: Japan to Cut Crypto Tax Burden to 20% Uniform Rate in Boost for Local Bitcoin Traders
contentSnippet: The proposed tax change, supported by the government, will categorize crypto profits under a separate-taxation framework.

title: ‘Inevitable’ $50K BTC price crash: 5 things to know in Bitcoin this week
contentSnippet: Bitcoin gained fresh BTC price crash predictions as it fell to $85,000 in flash volatility at the monthly close amid a lack of liquidity.

title: Ethereum's Fusaka Upgrade, Grayscale Chainlink Trust: Crypto Week Ahead
contentSnippet: Your look at what's coming in the week starting Dec. 1.

title: Crypto payments coming to PlayStation as Sony plans stablecoin launch in 2026
contentSnippet: Sony Bank is reportedly pursuing a US license and partnering with Bastion as it develops a 2026 dollar stablecoin connected to its growing Web3 unit, BlockBloom.

title: イーロン・マスク氏「エネルギーこそ真の通貨」、ビットコインは基づくと主張
contentSnippet: テスラCEOのイーロン・マスク氏が「エネルギーこそ真の通貨」と主張し、ビットコインはエネルギーに基づいていると説明。一方、著名経済学者やピーター・シフ氏は「本質的価値がない」と批判を続けている。

title: Bitcoin price slides to $85K: How low can BTC go in December?
contentSnippet: Bitcoin opened the week in the red as fears of a Bank of Japan rate hike triggered a yen carry trade unwind, potentially risking a drop in BTC price to $67,000.

title: 政府・与党、暗号資産の分離課税導入を検討へ 調整開始─NHK報道
contentSnippet: 政府・与党が暗号資産投資の分離課税化を巡り調整に入ったとNHKが報道。現行は最大55％の総合課税で、制度見直し議論が年末の税制大綱へ進む見通し。

title: Why China’s Bitcoin mining activity is surging again after a 4-year crackdown
contentSnippet: Bitcoin mining in China is rising again. From dominance to ban to resurgence, this makes an engaging story.

title: HashKey Leads Hong Kong’s Crypto Market as Losses Deepen Ahead of IPO
contentSnippet: Ultra-low fees kept monetization in the basis-point range, leaving revenue unable to offset steep losses despite surging Hong Kong trading volumes.

title: 「チェーンリンク」の将来性は？トークン化市場に必須インフラ
contentSnippet: チェーンリンク（LINK）の将来性を解説。2030年に16兆ドル規模が予測されるトークン化市場で、既存金融とブロックチェーンを接続するオラクルとして80%超のシェアを獲得。SWIFT・J.P.Morganとの提携事例も紹介。

title: How a weakening US labor market is putting pressure on Bitcoin and crypto prices
contentSnippet: Cooling US labor data is shifting growth expectations, rate paths and liquidity, creating new macro pressures for Bitcoin and the broader crypto market.

title: スイ（SUI）のステーキングで高利率なのは？自分で行う方法と取引所比較
contentSnippet: SUIのステーキング方法を徹底解説。取引所（年利最大4.28%）、ウォレット、リキッドステーキングの3つの運用方法を比較表付きで紹介。初心者向けのOKCoin Japanから、Slushウォレットでの自己管理、Haedalでの高度な運用まで、リスクと利回りを考慮した最適な選択をサポート。

title: ワールドコインの本人認証方法｜マイナンバーカードでWLDを受け取る手順を解説
contentSnippet: ワールドコイン（WLD）がマイナンバーカードでの本人確認に対応。World Appでの認証手順を画像付きで解説。所要時間約5分で完了し、Orb認証済みの方も追加のWLDを獲得可能。受け取ったWLDの現金化・運用方法も紹介。

title: ソニー銀行、米ステーブルコイン事業化に向けBastionと業務提携　子会社設立も視野に
contentSnippet: ソニー銀行が米Bastionと業務提携し、米ドル建てステーブルコインの事業化を推進。日経報道によると2026年度の発行を計画し、ソニーグループの「経済圏」での決済活用を目指す。米国子会社設立とOCC銀行免許取得も視野に。

title: Ginco、Babylon Labsと提携「BTCFi 2.0」を推進
contentSnippet: GincoがBabylon Labsと提携し、第三者への預託なしでBTCを活用できる「BTCFi 2.0」を日本で推進。業務用ウォレットGEWからBTCステーキングが可能に。

title: Rising Japanese bond yields could shake global carry trade, crypto
contentSnippet: Japan’s 10-year bond yields surged to 1.86%, the highest since 2008, threatening to unwind the yen carry trade that funneled trillions into risk assets.

title: カザフスタン中銀、仮想通貨投資を計画　最大約470億円規模
contentSnippet: カザフスタン国立銀行（中銀）のティムール・スレイメノフ総裁は、金・外貨準備ポートフォリオの一部として、仮想通貨へ最大3億ドルの投資を検討していると発表した。

title: Bitcoin Drop Ends Up Liquidating $500M Bullish Bets in Early Asia Trading
contentSnippet: Binance, Hyperliquid, and Bybit saw over $160 million in liquidations each, with longs making up almost 90% of the total.

title: Dogecoin Slumps 9% Amid Bitcoin Weakness. Is a Larger Dump Coming?
contentSnippet: The launch of DOGE ETFs from Grayscale and Bitwise saw only $2.16 million in inflows, failing to attract expected institutional interest.

title: テザー社CEO、S&PによるステーブルコインUSDT格下げに反論　余剰資本を強調
contentSnippet: テザー社CEOがS&PによるステーブルコインUSDTのドルペッグ機能評価の格下げに反論した。余剰資本や米国債利回りを考慮していないと指摘している。

title: The Biggest Games Releasing in December 2025
contentSnippet: There are a few more big games releasing before the year's up, including Metroid Prime 4: Beyond and Marvel Cosmic Invasion.

title: I Made an AI Speak Every Century of English—It Ended With a Message From the Year 15,000
contentSnippet: I pushed a chatbot through several millennia of linguistic evolution. An AI from the year 5000 lectured me about pronouns.

title: UK Budget Confirms New Crypto Reporting Rules from January 1
contentSnippet: The UK government expects to raise $417 million in extra tax as UK-registered crypto exchanges are required to record customer details.

title: OpenAI Confirms Data Breach—Here's Who Is Impacted
contentSnippet: OpenAI said a Mixpanel breach exposed API user metadata—and urged customers to watch for phishing attacks.

title: 'Bad Joke': FC Barcelona Criticized for $22 Million Deal with Samoan Crypto Firm ZKP
contentSnippet: A former FC Barcelona board member hit out at the deal with ZKP on social media, highlighting the firm's “unknown” ownership.

title: Stablecoin Giant Tether to Shutter Uruguay Bitcoin Mining Operation
contentSnippet: USDT stablecoin issuer Tether is halting its Bitcoin mining operations in Uruguay due to high energy costs, local media has reported.

title: BitMine and Bitcoin Miners' Stocks Surge as BTC, Ethereum Recover
contentSnippet: Crypto-related equities like BitMine and leading Bitcoin mining stocks are jumping as Bitcoin and Ethereum regain key levels.

title: Myriad Moves: Predictors Turn Bullish on Bitcoin Rebounding to $100K
contentSnippet: Top markets on Myriad this week include predictions on Bitcoin's next price move, whether Brian Armstrong will appear UpOnly, and more.
